content.p: The Faculty of Science comprises seven schools and has strong links with the School of Life Sciences and School of Veterinary Medicine and Science. Schools from within the faculty also collaborate with those from the University's other faculties to form various research centres and research institutes. The faculty also offers cross-faculty courses in natural sciences. Natural Sciences School of Life Sciences School of Veterinary Medicine and Science Faculty of Science and Engineering Faculty of Science The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
